channel.title: How to make somone need a number of items before using something on object

item.title: How to make somone need a number of items before using something on object
item.dc:creator: @Rustyz Rustyz
item.description:
@Rustyz wrote:

I made a Halloween Event Where you get bone keys then use the keys on a portal I want to know how to make it so they need 28 keys to get the reward. and it deletes all the keys

Key - 605 (Non stackable)
Reward - 1053
Portal - 7316

Code

if (UsedOnObjectID == 7316 && ItemID == 605) { setAnimation(883); animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 1000; deleteItem(605, 28); addItem(1053, 1); } sendMessage("You have Completed the Halloween Event I hope you like your reward."); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make somone need a number of items before using something on object
